WHAT IS CETACEA

Sign up for Beta release.

Sign Up For Updates

01

Interactive Whale Tracking Via Web Mapping

Easily drop a pin to add your location to report a whale sighting; or use the map to find the closest reported sightings. Track the whales throughout the season.

02

Share Photos & Videos

Upload and share videos & photos of your sightings. Learn about the different whale types and behaviours through these up-close encounters.

Sign up for Beta release.

Sign Up For Updates

03

Discover the Latest News about Sightings.

Keep up to date with the latest news on the whales in the region. Learn about conservation efforts.
